eventTitle: A Damn Fine Bridal Party for Marlena

timeline.title: Guest Arrival & Welcome
timeline.description: Guests arrive and discover their character cards under their chairs (do not open yet!). Soft Twin Peaks soundtrack playing.
activities: Welcome guests at entrance
Direct guests to their seats (character cards hidden underneath)
Serve coffee and light appetizers
Guests mingle and chat
timeline.music: Twin Peaks Theme (Laura Palmer's Theme) - ambient
timeline.notes: Keep energy light and social. Character cards should be face-down under chairs.

timeline.title: Bridal Shower Activities
timeline.description: Traditional shower activities before the mystery begins
activities: Welcome speech and toast to Marlena
Bride opens gifts (optional - can be done after)
Quick shower game (e.g., Bridal Bingo, How Well Do You Know Marlena?)
Serve main food items
timeline.music: Light jazz, upbeat Twin Peaks instrumental themes
timeline.notes: Keep this segment warm and celebratory. Marlena should feel loved and celebrated.

timeline.title: THE MURDER ANNOUNCEMENT
timeline.description: Dramatic shift in atmosphere as the mystery begins!
activities: Lights dim briefly
Host makes dramatic announcement: 'A body has been discovered!'
Music changes to ominous Twin Peaks theme
Guests instructed to look under their chairs and find character cards
Brief explanation of mystery rules
timeline.music: Dark, mysterious Twin Peaks theme (The Bookhouse Boys)
timeline.notes: This is the pivotal moment! Build suspense. Consider a sound effect or visual cue.

timeline.title: Character Introduction
timeline.description: Guests read their character cards and introduce themselves
activities: Each guest reads their character card privately
Go around the room - each guest introduces their character in 1 minute
Guests begin to understand their objectives and secrets
Distribute any physical clues
timeline.music: Mysterious but not too loud - guests need to read and think
timeline.notes: Some guests may be shy - encourage them but keep it fun!

timeline.title: Investigation Phase
timeline.description: Free-form mystery solving - guests mingle, interrogate, and search for clues
activities: Guests move freely and interview each other
Host drops additional clues every 10 minutes if needed
Serve dessert and refill drinks
Guests can form alliances or work alone
timeline.music: Twin Peaks soundtrack - moderate volume for atmosphere
timeline.notes: This is the heart of the mystery! Watch energy and help if groups get stuck.

timeline.title: Cupcake Reveal Ceremony
timeline.description: The dramatic cupcake burning reveals the murderer!
activities: Host calls everyone to attention
Each guest receives a special cupcake
Using kitchen torch, host reveals hidden messages under frosting
The murderer is revealed!
Big dramatic reveal moment
timeline.music: Building dramatic music, culminating at reveal
timeline.notes: Practice the torch method beforehand! Safety first.

timeline.title: Wrap-Up & Awards
timeline.description: Celebrate the winners and return focus to Marlena
activities: Award prize to person who solved it (if anyone did)
Host explains the full mystery plot
Share funny moments from the investigation
Final toast to Marlena
Group photo with props
timeline.notes: End on a high note! Make sure Marlena feels special and celebrated.

backupPlans.guestsStuck: Have pre-written 'anonymous tips' ready to drop if no one is making progress
backupPlans.guestsNotParticipating: Have co-host or planted guest who's enthusiastic to help draw others in
backupPlans.runningLong: Skip or shorten traditional shower activities at beginning
backupPlans.runningShort: Have extra games ready or extend investigation phase
